Events that occurred on 1 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1913 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a postcard to Edith Bratt.
1923 - Voice actor Frank Duncan is born.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 21.
1939 - German translator Wolfgang Krege is born.
1941 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 42b.
1969 - T.C.B.S. member Sidney Barrowclough dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:

Aragorn captures Gollum in the Dead Marshes.
